snippet: Lewis Hamilton had something on his mind before he was ready to ascend to the top step of the Formula One podium for the second week in a row....
lead_paragraph: Lewis Hamilton had something on his mind before he was ready to ascend to the top step of the Formula One podium for the second week in a row.

headline.main: F1: Hamilton Dedicates Canadian Grand Prix Victory to Ali
headline.print_headline: F1: Hamilton Dedicates Canadian Grand Prix Victory to Ali
